item.title: Facebook Dropshipping Video Editor | Part Time + Bonus - Upwork
item.description:
Part-Time - 2hrs/day - Sunday off || $350-$400 per month DOE
Work Schedule: Flexible || Bonus: $25 for every winning video YOU create from scratch

Hey! Are you an experienced Facebook Dropshipping Video Editor from the Philippines who loves creating outstanding videos? If so, we want YOU on our team!

Who are we? We're a fast-growing eCommerce dropshipping company focused on Europe. To keep growing, we need your expertise to help us find the best candidates for our expanding family!

Application Questions:
**(Applications without answers to these questions will NOT be reviewed)**

1. Tell us about your experience making Facebook video ads for e-commerce dropshipping stores.
2. How long does it usually take you to create a video ad from scratch?
3. How long does it take you to translate one 30-second existing video and add text overlays/voice overs?
4. How quickly can you deliver the videos we need?
5. Can you work on Saturdays?

What We Need From You (IMPORTANT!).
The link to your portfolio featuring at least 10 of your best Facebook video ads (which you created from scratch) for e-commerce dropshipping stores in the last 6 months.
The link to your portfolio with at least 10 Video Ads you’ve edited/translated/added voice overs for eCommerce stores in Europe for the past 3 months.

If you meet the above requirements and are interested in this opportunity, please reply to this job post with "Your Video Editor Wizard!" and responses to the application questions. We look forward to hearing from you!

________________

Responsibilities:
Translate existing Videos using ChatGPT
Editing voice overs of existing videos and translate them
Edit, translate and add voice overs to videos
Maximum creation time of 20 mins per 30-seconds video (translating)
Create videos from scratch using existing content

Requirements:
Fluent English both verbal and written (B2+)
Fast & Reliable Internet connection
Video Software experience
Previous experience in adding voice overs and text blocks on top of videos
Previous experience with creating dropshipping videos from scratch for Facebook Advertising

Skills:
ChatGPT
Video software tools
Voice over software tools

Budget: $350
Posted On: June 25, 2024 12:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I’m looking for a reliable and experienced video editor for my growing YouTube channel. (Must have good experience)

I currently have two video editors however I’m looking to increase the quality of the videos and up the number of videos produced.

Each video is between 8 to 12 minutes.

My channel is in the travel niche. I would require you to be aware of YouTube copyright guidelines and have some previous experience on YouTube.

Please make sure you are aware of the YouTube automation business model.

Final thing if you are new to YouTube or editing please don’t apply

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 25, 2024 12:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Reaction Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor to join our team and help create engaging reaction videos. As a video editor, you will be responsible for selecting and editing footage, adding music and sound effects, and ensuring the final product is visually appealing and aligned with our brand. The ideal candidate should have a keen eye for detail, a strong sense of storytelling, and proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro.

    Responsibilities:
    - Select and edit footage for reaction videos
    - Add music and sound effects to enhance the overall experience
    - Ensure the videos are visually appealing and aligned with our brand
    - Collaborate with the content team to develop creative ideas

    Requirements:
    - Proven experience as a video editor
    - Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.)
    - Strong storytelling and creative skills
    - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

    If you are passionate about creating engaging reaction videos and have the required skills, we would love to hear from you. Please include your portfolio of previous work for review.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 25, 2024 12:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Short Homepage Video for Trading Company Website - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video editor to create a high-quality video of 30 seconds for the header section of our trading company's website. The video will be used to convey a dynamic and professional vibe, reflecting our global trading operations in consumer goods.

Video Content:
- The video should be composed of free/available stock footage.
- Focus on footage that includes harbors, shipping, containers, and warehouses.
- Incorporate scenes of the sea to introduce blue color elements.
- The video should give a sense of global trading and logistics.

Video Specifications:
Duration: 30 seconds.
Resolution: 1440 x 840 pixels.
Aspect Ratio: 16:9.

Visual Style:
- The video should have a professional and dynamic feel.
- White text will be overlaid on the video, so ensure the video background supports clear readability of the text.

Deadline:
The final video should be completed and delivered by the end of this week.

We can send you an example of desired style after the start of the contract.


Posted On: June 25, 2024 12:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Footage-Based Video, Dynamic Transition, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Web Design
Skills: Footage-Based Video, Dynamic Transition, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Web Design
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Social Media Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Video Editor to level up our video and quickly edit raw video files for social media platforms. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of brand standards and be able to create engaging videos in both horizontal and vertical formats. As a Video Editor, your responsibilities will include organizing and reviewing raw footage, making cuts and adjustments, adding transitions and effects, and ensuring the final videos align with our brand guidelines. This role requires a creative mindset, excellent attention to detail, and proficiency in video editing software. If you are passionate about creating visually appealing content and have a strong track record in video editing, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 12:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: "Instagram Reels Editor & Content Creator Wanted: Weekly Assignments Available!" - Upwork
item.description:
Hi!

I'm looking for someone who can edit high-quality and realistic Instagram reels. I have an example, and if it goes well, I can have you edit more videos every week. I also need someone who can come up with ideas for videos, mainly for Instagram reels for models. I'm curious if you can do this. Here is an example:

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8XA_Z9yYk8/?igsh=djhpODh3b3hyeWR3

I'm interested to know if you're capable of this task, and please let me know if you're not. Additionally, please provide your pricing for this service. If you consistently deliver good and realistic edits, I will have plenty of weekly assignments for you.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 11:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Netherlands

item.title: Looking for a skilled video editor for YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
So, This is my channel
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkQjP85QVYQQAxkbqpJsYsg
I need a very skilled video editor to level up my content in order to compete with bigger channels in my niche.

example:
https://youtu.be/JQFQ4BHL8_g?si=Kiz6TTFb0mr-y9iT

We're looking for someone with the following requirements
- Must be fluent in English
- Fast turnaround time (3-5days)
- Fast response times
- Good understanding of YouTube retention (important)
- Ideally has expertise in storytelling (important)
- Add clips to give more context to the video
- Capacity for long-term work
- $50 - $100 PER video (depends on quality)

When applying, please provide us examples of previous work and YouTube videos you’ve worked or you will automatically be disqualified to work with us.

Start the proposal with (I READ IT ALL) so I know you've read everything.


Budget: $60
Posted On: June 25, 2024 11:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing
Country: Morocco
